item.title: PI Combine items
item.dc:creator: @wannaflyhi wannaflyhi
item.description:
@wannaflyhi wrote:

Lets say i wanted to make it so, to create a Dragon Fire Shield you need to click on two items to combine them to a dfs, butt… you need 99 smithing to do so. How would i go about doing this?

or how do i convert this to PI

} else if (itemUsed == 15187 && useWith == 1540) {
if (playerLevel[13] >= 130) {
deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
addItem(15185, 1);
addSkillXP((120 * playerLevel[13]), 13);
setAnimation(0x378);
actionTimer = 15;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(
“You need a Smithing level of 130 to make this shield.”);
}

Read full topic
